Accept next point ?

Source: R/acceptNextPoint.R
acceptNextPoint.Rd

acceptNextPoint checks whether the proposed point should be accepted

Usage

acceptNextPoint(current.point, proposed.point, densityFunction)

Arguments

current.point

Current state of the markov chain, given as a sf dataframe.

proposed.point

Proposed next state of the markov chain, given as a sf dataframe.

densityFunction

Function that can take a point given as a sf dataframe as a input and returns the target density at that location.

Value

TRUE if the proposed point should be accepted

On this page

Developed by Daniele Da Re, Enrico Tordoni, Manuele Bazzichetto.
